short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Passively share what you're doing online with your friends on Homie!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Homie chrome extension syncs your Chrome history to your Homie account so that you can share what you're up to with your friends. Sign in via phone number, and view your social feed on the Homie app!
